name: Google Fresh Clean Login Screens
description:
Google Accounts Fresh Clean Login Screens

 gives you new Login Screens for almost all Google's web apps! (Google +, Google Play, Drive, Docs, Gmail, Youtube, Maps, Latitude, Reader, Agenda, Groups, News, Photos [Picasa], Wallet [Checkout], Offers, Shopping, Sites, Finance, Developer, Code, Orkut, Blogger, ) and More. With a single installation you'll enjoy a new look for all your Google services (web apps). No more annoying taglines and cluttered stuff, just a beautiful login screen for each service you use. Check the full screenshots on my blog for more details. Creative Userstyles - Google Fresh Clean Login Screens http://creativeuserstyles.blogspot.com.br

user.name: Adriano Monecchi
user.about:
I'm a 26 year designer from Brazil. All styles/scripts I publish are originally created for my personal use. I invite you to test them and if you like please consider donating any amount to support the styles updates.
Comments in the forum for requests or doubts are welcome and so are your "likes" & "shares". 

Thanks for stopping by :)

Enjoy!
